results.content: Instructor is not prepared for each lesson. It seems like the things he should be explaining are little side notes that he mumbles and never talks about again. The title of the course isn't even what this is. The instructor even says that you don't learn Spring at all, it's more of Angular course for Java developers, but it's barely that either.

response.content: We will work on the issues and will try and ensure a 5-star experience for you
